mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KUKOKUK_DAILY_STUDY_MATERIALS (SCHOOL, GRADE, MATERIAL_TITLE, KEYWORDS, CONTENT, SOURCE_FILENAME, SEQUENCE, FILE_PATH, GROUP_NO) VALUES (#{school}, #{grade}, #{materialTitle}, #{keywords}, #{content}, #{sourceFilename}, #{sequence}, #{filePath}, #{groupNo})
mapper.select: SELECT DAILY_STUDY_MATERIAL_NO AS dailyStudyMaterialNo, SCHOOL, GRADE, MATERIAL_TITLE AS materialTitle, KEYWORDS, CONTENT, SOURCE_FILENAME AS sourceFilename, SEQUENCE, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate FROM KUKOKUK_DAILY_STUDY_MATERIALS WHERE DAILY_STUDY_MATERIAL_NO = #{dailyStudyMaterialNo}
